challenges.title: Previous and Next
challenges.description:
Given integer n, print two lines:
The next number for the number n is <n+1>.
The previous number for the number n is <n-1>.
challenges.outputDescription: Two lines in the exact format.
examples:
Input:
10

Output:
The next number for the number 10 is 11.
The previous number for the number 10 is 9.

tests.expected:
The next number for the number 10 is 11.
The previous number for the number 10 is 9.
